title: 'Intelligence failure of the highest order' — How Afghanistan fell to the Taliban so quickly
content:
1. 'Intelligence failure of the highest order' — How Afghanistan fell to the Taliban so quickly  CNBC
  2. Female mayor in Afghanistan says she's waiting for Taliban to 'come ... and kill me'  NBC News
